p.d: XTERRA is the world’s premier off-road multisport event. An extreme competition, the XTERRA format combines swimming with mountain biking and trail running. It has been described as one part triathlon, one part mountain bike race, and one part “survival of the fittest”. The typical distances are a 1.5k swim, 30k mountain bike, and 10k trail run.
